homeautomation.sensors

Class RaspPiMotionDetectionSensor

  • java.lang.Object
    • homeautomation.sensors.RaspPiMotionDetectionSensor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.pi4j.io.gpio.event.GpioPinListener, com.pi4j.io.gpio.event.GpioPinListenerDigital, HomeAutomationModule, java.util.EventListener

    public class RaspPiMotionDetectionSensor
extends java.lang.Object
implements HomeAutomationModule, com.pi4j.io.gpio.event.GpioPinListenerDigital
    Wrapper for the functionality to access the motion sensor. If the motion detector is in DUMMY mode, some events are simulated (every 3 sesonds)
    Author:
    Philipp Jenke

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  RaspPiMotionDetectionSensor.Mode
      The dummy mode is used for debugging where the physical sensor is not available.
